name: Orbital Recovery
description:
Navigate your player to fix your space station. You'll need to disconnect from you oxygen supply to do so. Disconnect too long, and you'll die.

Controls:
  Mouse - Rotate
  Left Click - Jetpack
  Right Click - Action (Start Mini Game,  Connect to Oxygen, Disconnect)
  Scroll ( or r/f) - Change Tether Size
